visionText: To be the best special effects company Make-up in the Middle East. And to become the first choice in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia In the field of business and training, talent development and acquisition.
messageText: We strive to provide high professional work, And create creative artists thanks to the efforts. And to be a catalyst for business development Creating job opportunities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and help achieve Vision 2030.
goalsText: Improve the quality of local business to achieve High level of excellence. Highlight the special effects of make-up artists. Developing expertise and competencies.
servicesText: We cover all costume parties and cosplays.
We provide all kinds of makeup and cosmetics.
We cover production work for movies and videos.
serviceTitle: An injury, a wound, a burn you want to simulate?
serviceContent: We simulate all types of injuries using our advanced technology and silicone molds. making it realistic.
contactText: Looking for movie character making, costume party makeup, production work. call us
